original_text: And I will make thy tongue cleave to the roof of thy mouth, that thou shalt be dumb, and shalt not be to them a reprover: for they are a rebellious house.
korean_text: 내가 네 혀를 네 입천장에 붙게 하여 네가 말 못하는 자가 되어 그들을 꾸짖는 자가 되지 못하게 하리니 그들은 패역한 족속임이니라

sentences.original_text: And I will make thy tongue cleave
to the roof of thy mouth,
and shalt not be to them a reprover:
for they are a rebellious house.
